text: Eisarena Wolfsburg Eis Arena Wolfsburg is an arena in Wolfsburg, Germany. It is primarily used for the ice hockey club EHC Wolfsburg Grizzly Adams. Eisarena Wolfsburg opened in 2006 and holds 4,660 people. ==External links== *Arena website Category:Indoor arenas in Germany Category:Indoor ice hockey venues in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in Wolfsburg Category:Sports venues in Lower Saxony
title: Eis Arena Wolfsburg
